statements: SELECT * FROM PatientData;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, test_results->'blood_pressure' AS blood_pressure FROM PatientData WHERE test_results @> '{"blood_pressure": "120/80"}';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM PatientData ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientData WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, test_results FROM PatientData WHERE test_results->'blood_pressure' > 120
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM PatientData WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_name ILIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, birthdate FROM patients
SELECT test_name, result FROM tests
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='F'
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM tests ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, gender, birthdate FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM tests WHERE result = 'Positive' AND test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT test_name, test_date, result FROM tests ORDER BY test_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients p JOIN tests t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id WHERE p.patient_name LIKE '%John%' AND t.result = 'Negative';
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE blood_type = 'O+';
SELECT * FROM patient_data;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_data ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM patient_data WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, admission_date FROM patient_data JOIN medical_history ON patient_data.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT test_name, result FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_data ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM patient_data WHERE blood_type = 'AB+';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment, admission_date FROM patient_data JOIN medical_history ON patient_data.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT test_name, result, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_data JOIN medical_history USING(patient_id) JOIN test_results USING(patient_id) WHERE test_name = 'COVID-19 Test' ORDER BY admission_date DESC, test_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_name, condition, diagnosis_date FROM medical_history INNER JOIN patients ON medical_history.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date, notes FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, condition, diagnosis_date FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT test_name, result FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_name, appointment_date, notes FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, dob, gender, address FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE condition='Asthma';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT result_id, test_name, result, date_tested FROM test_results WHERE result='Positive';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_date, doctor_name, reason FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, dob, gender FROM patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT p.name, m.condition, m.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.id = m.patient_id;
SELECT p.name, t.test_name, t.result FROM patients p LEFT JOIN test_results t ON p.id = t.patient_id;
SELECT p.name, a.appointment_date, a.doctor_name FROM patients p JOIN appointments a ON p.id = a.patient_id ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC;
